doc.name: ImageAttribute
doc.description: This is an attribute that is rendered as an image. Its source parameter specifies a file containing an image (GIF, JPEG, etc.), and its scale attribute specifies a scaling factor, as a percentage.
doc.author: Edward A. Lee and Steve Neuendorffer
doc.property: The scale, as a percentage. This is a double that defaults to 100.0.
The source image file. This is a file name or URL, where the default is "$CLASSPATH/ptolemy/vergil/kernel/attributes/ptIIplanetIcon.gif".
